segments.text: You don ’ t have to eat them . I don ’ t mind .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks , Mom.Can I have dessert now ? I love chocolate cake .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No dessert for you unless you eat all of your vegetables .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I don ’ t like them.It ’ s not fair .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can have some fruits for dessert.If you eat an apple and a banana , I might let you have a small piece of chocolate cake .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , actually I don ’ t mind eating peas and carrots.But I hate broccoli and cauliflower .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll remember that for next time.You ’ ll get extra peas and carrots , but no broccoli or cauliflower , ok ?
segments.speaker: S2
